title: Wary Business Associate
description: John_Jeffries operates a Chapel owned by ConsiglioDeiDieci, establishing a formal business relationship with moderate interaction strength (230.84) but negative trust (-50.51). The relationship is characterized by professional necessity rather than mutual confidence, with John_Jeffries functioning as an operator within ConsiglioDeiDieci's property portfolio while maintaining a cautious distance typical of the Council's impersonal governance approach.
